A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Terrible. Only AOTC was a worse star wars film. Long on action and short on storyline. Terrible character development\, poorly executed and misplaced humor\, too much cgi\, and a disservice to characters from the Original trilogy. Thumbs down for Rian Johnson\, Disney\, and everyone associated with creating the storyline for this film. It definitely falls well short of star wars standards.
